commit.message:
decl2.c (qualified_lookup_using_namespace): Look through namespace aliases.

        * decl2.c (qualified_lookup_using_namespace): Look through
        namespace aliases.

        * decl.c (push_using_decl): Return the old decl on namespace level.

From-SVN: r34073

+	* decl2.c (qualified_lookup_using_namespace): Look through
+	namespace aliases.
+
+	* decl.c (push_using_decl): Return the old decl on namespace level.
